flow.descriptionCdata:
2b677cc4-c78e-4eb8-90fa-cabd9ca0b8d5.017fc3d0-e730-4285-9991-4643e36d1dad.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
2b677cc4-c78e-4eb8-90fa-cabd9ca0b8d5.18ce7647-a0e3-427a-b785-5a31944d53d8.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:

Scriptlet Example\:

2b677cc4-c78e-4eb8-90fa-cabd9ca0b8d5.337bfd90-fbd2-46f8-9b46-87ff507f8605.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:

Scriptlet Example\:

2b677cc4-c78e-4eb8-90fa-cabd9ca0b8d5.37475755-8604-4b00-90c9-1f6918a2f76c.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
2b677cc4-c78e-4eb8-90fa-cabd9ca0b8d5.6ca90413-09d0-4b24-b387-8744eb753c4a.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
2b677cc4-c78e-4eb8-90fa-cabd9ca0b8d5.b9529774-5d84-4c78-8066-93a3d8345758.description=
Loops as many number of times as specified in the input, that is, counts from 1 to another number incrementing by 1 for each iteration.

Inputs\:
count - Number of loops to complete.
reset - If true, then the counter will restart counting from 1.

Returns\:
The number that was just counted.

Responses\:
has more 	- Counting has not completed, one or more iterations are pending.
no more 	- Counting completed. This will only be returned once, then counting restarts.
failure 	- Something went wrong.
2b677cc4-c78e-4eb8-90fa-cabd9ca0b8d5.c46b1a4a-efa4-4860-8129-edcd9c7f7b41.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:

ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal

2b677cc4-c78e-4eb8-90fa-cabd9ca0b8d5.description=
Flex up a VM to the specific CPU Memory and Disk that is requested.

Input Parameters\:
 serviceName -name of the service that will be created with this flow
 VCenterHost -  vCenter host to execute against
 VCenterUsername - vCenter username
 VCenterPassword - vCenter password.
 virtualMachine - This is the virtual machine that will be flexed.
 dataStore -  target datastore on the vCenter host for the VMs
 hostSystem - target ESX host for the VMs
 cpuCount - number of cpus the virtual machine should have.
 memSize - amount of memory the virtual machine should have.
 addDisk - whether or not disk should be added to the vm.

Responses\:
   success - if the command completes execution and its exit code is 0
   failure - otherwise

Result Fields\:
 NA
flow.name: SCVMM_SetCPUAndMem
